meaningMnemonic: From the <radical>roof</radical>, an <radical>icicle</radical> falls and hits <radical>wolverine</radical> in the <radical>forehead</radical>, and he has to go over to the <radical>stool</radical> to <kanji>lie down</kanji>. And eventually he goes to <kanji>sleep</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: While wolverine <kanji>sleep</kanji>s, he makes a horrible <reading>neigh</reading>ing (ね) sound. It's like there's a giant horse in his mouth screaming to get out! NEIGH NEIGH!
